title: S. Hardison
content:
James S. Hardison III
Services for James S. Hardison III will be at 10:30 am on Saturday, September 20, 2014 at Mt. Zion Missionary Baptist Church with the Dr. James S. Hardison Sr. officiating. Burial will be in the garden of Memories under the direction of Robinson Family Mortuary.
James S. Hardison III, 15, of Alexandria passed away on September 11, 2014 at his residence.
He was preceded in death by his grandmothers Mattie B. Hall and Alice Faye Young; great grandfathers Theo Hardison Jr. and Ralph Mathis; great grandmother Adline Mathis; and aunt Alicia D. Hall.
Survivors include his mother Racheal Hall; sister Shaquira Hall; 8 brothers; 7 sisters; host of grandparents, aunts, uncles, relatives and friends.
Viewing will be from 9:00 am - 10:00 am at the church.
